resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

Roadside Assistance representatives are standing by 24/7 to assist you. Should you require further assistance you need to cancel your roadside assistance request, please contact Roadside Assistance using the button below.
To Better serve you, specialists are available to take your call from 9 AM to 9 PM Indian Standard Time(+5:30 GMT),Monday through Saturday.
The RSA (Roadside Assistance) mobile application is a free, easy to use mobile resoure connecting you with Roadside Assistance at touch of a button.
